336 
 
  
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    (vi) EDALV accepts Health Science In lieu of Biology for 
Health Education, but Biology is mandatory for Physical 
Education.  
(vii) UNIZIK requires Mathematics, English, Biology, Health 
and Physical Education or Health Science/Health 
Education.  
(viii) BENIN requires five (5) 'O’level credits passes /TC II merit 
to including English Language and one (1) Science 
subject.  
(ix) AAU and DELSU require English Language, Biology and 
'O' level pass in Mathematics.  
(x) IBADAN - same as in Human Kinetics.  
(xi) MAIDUGURI and EDKAN require 'O' levelcredit pass in 
Mathematics.  
(xii) BABCOCK requires 'O' level credit passes in 
Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and any other Science 
subject except Health Science/Agricultural Science.  
(xiii) UYO requires 'O' level credit passes in English Language 
and Chemistry.  
(xiv) AAU requires 'O' level passes in Mathematics  
(xv) AAUA requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes /TC II merit 
includingEnglish Language, Biology, Mathematics and 
two (2) Science subject.  
(xvi) EKSU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include 
English Language, Mathematics, Biology/Health  
Education and one (1) Science subjects at one (1)sitting.  
(xvii) DELSU req uires 'O' level pass in Mathematics and 
two (2) other subjects  
(xviii) TASUED requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes at 
one (1) sitting or six (6) 'O'level credit passes at two (2) 
sittings to include English Language and one (1) Science 
subject and Mathematics.  
(xix) ABU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credits passes/TC II merit 
includingEnglish Language, Biology, Mathematics and 
any two (2) Science subjects.  
(xx) UNN requires  
   For Physical Education
